skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Decreases [Bomb] debuff detonation countdowns by 1 turn. Also instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target and decreases the duration of those debuffs by 1 turn.
skills.name: Ruinous Crush

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [HP Burn] debuff on each enemy for 3 turns. 

[Passive Effect]

Enemies receive 100% more damage from [HP Burn] debuffs for each [Bomb] debuff they are under.
skills.name: Magma Flood

skills.desc: Removes all buffs from all enemies, then attacks them. Places a [Bomb] debuff on each enemy that detonate after 2 turns. Places 1 additional [Bomb] debuff for each buff removed by this Skill. The [Bomb] debuffs cannot be blocked or removed.
skills.name: Rain of Bombs

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on Bommal the Dreadhorn for 5 turns, then summons two Dreadbombs and grants an Extra Turn.

The [Increase ATK] buff cannot be removed.

[Passive Effect]

Summons 1 Dreadbomb every time Bommalâ€™s Turn Meter is decreased.
skills.name: Dread Minions

skills.desc:
Each time an enemy places any debuff (except [Bomb] debuffs) on Bommal, places a [Bomb] debuff on that enemy that detonates after 2 turns. 

These [Bomb] debuffs cannot be blocked or removed. 

Each time a [Bomb] debuff detonates on an enemy, has a 25% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn. 

Bommal receives 300% more damage from [Bomb] debuffs.
skills.name: Pressure Wave [P]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], [True Fear], [Petrification] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Decreases the damage taken from Poison debuffs by 90%.
skills.name: Almighty Tolerance [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from skills that scale based on enemy MAX HP cannot exceed 10% of the Boss' MAX HP when attacking the Boss.
skills.name: Almighty Strength [Passive]

skills.desc: All Turn Meter reduction effects are decreased by 50% when used against the Boss.
skills.name: Almighty Persistence [Passive]
